18354.「今のところ 被害は たいしたことないけど\n もし この魔瘴が\n 外にまで:
So far, the damage has been minor, but if this
demon miasma were to spread outside...

18358.「あ…あんた もしかして\n 魔瘴の中にいたの！？: Ah...you were in a demon miasma by any chance!

18359.「顔色が 悪いみたいだけど\n 本当に大丈夫なの？: You look pale. Are you sure you're okay?

18360.「大丈夫そうね……。常識的に考えれば\n 魔瘴の中になんていたら すぐに死に至る:
She seems to be okay... common sense tells us that being in a demon miasma Child would kill you in a heartbeat... but what's with this
girl...

18361.「ねぇねぇ。\n 名前だけでも 教えてくんない？: Hey, hey. Can you at least tell me your name?

18362.「ボクは エルフじゃない……。\n 家に帰らせて……。: I'm not an Elf... let me go home...

18363.「それ 聞きあきた。\n じゃあさ 家はどこなの？:
I'm tired of hearing that. Then, where's your
home?

29387.魔瘴が 辺りに立ち込めている。\nこれ以上 先に進むのは危険なようだ。:
Demon miasma is in the air. It seems dangerous
to proceed any further.

58743.「よく来たな <pc>。\n ちょうどいい。近くへ 来るがよい。:
Nice to see you here <pc>. Just in
time. Come closer.

58744.「じつはな 最近 この王都カミハルムイで\n 身体の不調を訴える者が 多発してい:
As a matter of fact, there have been a number
of people complaining of physical ailments in
Kamiharmui City recently.

58745.「今 ひとりの博士に\n 原因を 探ってもらってるとこでな。\n そなたにも 博:
I'm in the process of having a doctor look
into the cause of the problem. I'd like you to
hear what he has to say.

58746.「しかし 遅いな。\n もう そろそろ来ると思うのだが……。:
But it's late. I think they should be here by
now...

58747.「やれやれ やっと来たか。\n 若き天才博士の お出ましだな。:
Well, well, well. Finally. Here comes the
young genius.

58748.「うう……。しくじった～。\n うっかり 寝坊しちゃったわ。: Ugh... I messed up~. I accidentally overslept.

58749.「紹介しよう <pc>。\n 魔瘴研究者の ハネツキ博士だ。:
Let me introduce <pc>. This is Dr.
Hanetsuki, a demon miasma researcher.

58750.「おおっと あなたが <pc>か。\n ウワサは聞いてるわよ。\n 王都を守った:
Oh, you're <pc>? I've heard rumors.
You're the hero who defended Royal City,
right?

58751.「あたし ハネツキ。\n 以後 よろしく～。: I'm Hanetsuki. Pleased to meet you.

58752.「で ハネツキ博士よ。\n なにか わかったのか？: So, Dr. Hanetsuki. What did you find out?

58753.「はい。大気中の魔瘴濃度が 増加しています。\n 王都近くに 魔瘴が発生したため:
Yes. The concentration of miasma in the
atmosphere is increasing. This is probably due
to the miasma outbreak near the Royal City.

58754.「魔瘴は 濃度が うすくても\n 身体に影響を及ぼしますので 体調を崩す者が\n:
Since demon miasma affects the body even at a
very low concentration, this may be the reason
why so many people have fallen ill.

58755.「なるほどな。\n して 魔瘴の発生場所は どこだ？: I see. So, where does demon miasma occur?

58757.「発生場所を はっきりさせるには\n 現地まで 目視確認に行く必要があります。\:
We need to go to the site for a visual
inspection to determine the location of the
outbreak. We would like to borrow your escort.

58758.「ふむ。護衛か……それならば ここに\n うってつけの人物が おるではないか。:
Hmmm. A bodyguard... then I think we have just
the man for the job.

58759.「王都を救ってくれた <pc>よ。\n ハネツキ博士の護衛を やってもらえぬか？:
You saved Royal City, <pc>. Will you
be Dr. Hanetsuki's bodyguard?<yesno><close>

58760.「そなたなら 安心して まかせられるのだ。\n そう言わずに 頼む。:
I can leave it to you with peace of mind.
Please don't say that.

58762.「では <pc>に\n 護衛を まかせよう。\n それでいいな？ ハネツキ博士よ:
Then <pc> will be in charge of the
escort. Is that all right with you? Dr.
Hanetsuki.

58763.「やっりー！\n 英雄が 護衛についてくれるなんて\n ラッキーだわ！: Yay! I'm so lucky to have a hero as my escort.

58765.「よし。では <pc>よ。\n あとは ハネツキ博士から聞いてくれ。:
OK. Okay, <pc>. Dr. Hanetsuki will
tell you the rest.

58766.「ええと さっそくで悪いんだけど……: Well, I'm sorry to start right off...

58767.「魔瘴の発生場所を 突き止めて\n どれくらいの被害が 出ているのか\n ちょっ:
I'd like to find out where the demon miasma is
coming from and maybe find out how much damage
it's causing.

58768.「街道沿いは 兵士が チェックしてるし\n 発生してるとしたら たぶん\n 洞く:
Soldiers are checking the roadsides, and if
there's an outbreak, it's probably in a cave
or somewhere private.

58769.「北だけ ほかに比べて 魔瘴濃度が高めだから\n 位置的に カミハルムイ領北の北:
The concentration of miasma is higher in the
north than in the other areas, so it may be
located in the area north of Kamiharmui North.

58770.「そこまで行く間 あなたに\n 護衛を お願いしたいんだけど\n どう？ やって:
I was wondering if I could ask you to escort
me while I get there. You'll do it, won't you?

58771.「サンキュー。それじゃ 目的地に\n 着くまでの間 あたしは こっそりと\n あ:
Thank you. Well then, I'll follow you
stealthily until we get to our Land Room.

58772.「あなたが 出発するまでの間\n あたしは ひとまず 部屋に戻ってるわ。:
I'm going back to my room for now until you
leave.

58773.「あたしの部屋は この城の東の方。\n 厨房の近くだから よろしく～。:
My room is on the east side of the castle.
It's near the kitchen.

58774.「サンキュー。それじゃ 目的地に\n 着くまでの間 あたしは こっそりと\n あ:
Thank you. Well then, I'll follow you
stealthily until we get to our Land Room.

58775.「……って あなた ほかの人たちの\n 頼まれごとを たくさん抱えてるみたいね。:
You seem to have a lot of other people's
requests. Go take care of those first.

58776.「おお？ そっかー。\n んー どうしよっかなあ。: Oh? I see. I wonder what I should do.

58777.「ホント言うと あたし 忙しいから\n 手伝ってくれると うれしいんだけどね。\:
To tell you the truth, I'm busy, so I'd be
happy if you could help me. Come back when you
feel like it.

58779.「魔瘴の発生場所を 突き止めて\n どれくらいの被害が 出ているのか\n ちょっ:
I'd like to find out where the demon miasma is
coming from and maybe find out how much damage
it's causing.

58780.「街道沿いは 兵士が チェックしてるし\n 発生してるとしたら たぶん\n 洞く:
Soldiers are checking the roadsides, and if
there's an outbreak, it's probably in a cave
or somewhere private.

58781.「北だけ ほかに比べて 魔瘴濃度が高めだから\n 位置的に カミハルムイ領北の北:
The concentration of miasma is higher in the
north than in the other areas, so it may be
located in the area north of Kamiharmui North.

58782.「そこまで行く間 あなたに\n 護衛を お願いしたいんだけど\n どう？ やって:
I was wondering if I could ask you to escort
me while I get there. You'll do it, won't you?

58784.「魔物を倒してくれて 助かったわ。\n 中に入れなくて 困ってたのよ。:
Thank you for defeating the monster. I was
having trouble getting inside.

58785.「ここが 発生場所か。\n まいったわ。想像以上の量ね。:
So this is where it happened. Oh, my God.
That's a lot more than I expected.

58787.「ヒッ……！ や…やめて！\n こわいことしないで……！: H...! Don't... don't! Don't be afraid...!

58788.「大丈夫よ。なにもしないから。\n あたし ハネツキっていうの。\n ねぇ あん:
Don't worry. I won't do anything. My name is
Hanetsuki. Hey, what's your name?

58791.「あんた ハラ減ってんの？\n お姉ちゃんが おいしいモノ作るからさ。\n 一緒:
Are you hungry? My sister is going to make
something delicious. Let's go to Royal City
together. Right?

58793.「あはは。なんも しないって。\n さあ 行くわよ。:
Ha-ha-ha. I won't do anything. Come on, let's
go.

58794.「そうだ <cs_pchero>。\n 後で あたしの部屋に来てね。\n お礼す:
Yes <cs_pchero>. Come to my room later. I'll
thank you. Nice to meet you.

58795.「ダメ。言わない。\n 知らない人に 家を教えちゃダメって\n パパに 言われた:
No. I won't. My dad told me never to tell
strangers where we live.

58798.「護衛してくれて ありがとね。\n これは あたしからの お礼よ。:
Thank you for protecting me. This is my way of
saying thank you.

58799.「おかげで 魔瘴の発生場所が わかったけど\n それよりも おどろいたのは\n:
Thanks to you, I found out where the demon miasma was generated, but what surprised me more than that was that the Miasma Childma
came out of the miasma.

58800.「どうして 魔瘴が 平気なのかしら。\n どこから来たのかも 気になるし\n い:
I wonder how she's okay with demon miasma. I
wonder where she came from... she's an
interesting girl...

58801.「あの子のこととか 魔瘴のこととか\n じっくり 腰をすえて 調べてみたいの。:
I'd like to sit down and do some research on
that Miasma Child and her demon miasma.

58802.「それが終わったら あたしの研究を\n また 手伝ってもらうかもしれないから\n:
I may ask you to help me with my research
again when it's over, so I'll be glad to have
your help~.

58919.「だ～か～ら～。\n それは もう聞いたって。: That~ is~ that~. I already heard that.

58921.「はぁ。こりゃ ダメだ……。\n この子 何者なのかしら。:
Huh... This is no good... I wonder who this
girl is.

58922.「あっ。<pc>じゃん。\n ごめんね。今 取り込み中だからさ\n しばらくして:
Ah. That's <pc>. Sorry. I'm working
on it right now, so come back in a little
while.
